tagline: The lightning-fast ephemeral vector engine for real-time AI context.

definition.philosophy: Data that flows, context that lives in RAM, zero-disk dependency.

core_philosophy.speed: Sub-millisecond latency via Rust, SIMD, and in-memory circular buffers.
core_philosophy.ephemerality: Zero-disk persistence. Designed for data that has a high refresh rate and short shelf-life.
core_philosophy.privacy: Local-first execution. Embeddings and data never leave the host machine.
core_philosophy.simplicity: Single-binary CLI tool that follows the Unix philosophy (pipe-friendly).

technical_specifications.embedding_strategy: In-process vectorization via ONNX Runtime (e.g., BGE-Micro)
technical_specifications.concurrency: Lock-free or sharded RwLock for high-throughput ingestion
technical_specifications.target_performance: 10,000+ vector ingestions per second on standard CPU

problems_solved: Contextual lag: traditional vector DBs are too slow to update for real-time streams.
Cost of persistence: no need to pay for storage for logs or data that expires in minutes.
Privacy: eliminates the need to send real-time streams to third-party vector cloud providers.
Complexity: replaces heavy database infrastructure with a lightweight streaming engine.
